body: To be clear, my intention was `-phasebench=prefix:outfile` would measure all phases, writing the benchmarks to `outfile`, each prefixed by the string `prefix`.  The idea being so compilebench could use `-phasebench=BenchmarkGoTypes:/tmp/benchmark.txt`, `-phasebench=BenchmarkUnicode:/tmp/benchmark.txt`, etc. and the outputs would be lines labeled `BenchmarkGoTypes-parse`, `BenchmarkGoTypes-typecheck`, `BenchmarkUnicode-parse`, `BenchmarkUnicode-typecheck`, etc.
